categories: Category:Galactic Empire science and engineering personnel

nodes.text: Golanda was a female Human who led the artillery innovations and tactical-deployment at the Maw Installation.
She died when Tol Sivron flew the Death Star prototype into a black hole while trying to chase the stolen Sun Crusher during the Battle of the Maw in 11 ABY.
Golanda was known to constantly complain and Tol Sivron thought she was "about as beautiful as a gundark".
